Magmeld Emissary Leader Lada:
You know, what is the situation in the villages? You will not see there former splendour.
Some time ago in Marmalde appeared ferocious disease. People died in agony, their flesh and bones rot, and no one could do anything to stop.
We hypothesized that the cause of the disaster might have served the crimson Fog that appeared in those parts simultaneously with the craze.
